Plot: A man wanders out of the desert after a four year absence. His brother finds him, and together they return to L.A. to reunite the man with his young son. Soon after, he and the boy set out ...
Title: Paris, Texas
Actors: Harry Dean Stanton, Sam Berry, Bernhard Wicki, Dean Stockwell
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 15 wins & 8 nominations.
